original_text: And when he had thus spoken, one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand, saying, Answerest thou the high priest so?
korean_text: 이 말씀을 하시매 곁에 섰던 아랫사람 하나가 손으로 예수를 쳐 이르되 네가 대제사장에게 이같이 대답하느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: And when he had thus spoken,
one of the officers which stood by
sentences.korean_translation: 곁에 서 있던 군인 중 한 명이

sentences.original_text: struck Jesus with the palm of his hand,
Answerest thou the high priest so?
